pages.title: Ant Jar Block
pages.text: $(bold)$(#ff0000)The jar will only drop with Silk Touch!</>

This block is for decoration and for storing Ant Queens.
Place this block down by sneak right-clicking with an $(l:antsportation:items/ant_jar)ant jar.$()

If the ant jar is broken while there is an ant inside, the ant will pop out and the jar will break.
